panels.description: Средние значения измерений, сгруппированные по целям ping запросов

targets.expr:
(
  sum by (destination_node) (rate(kube_node_ping_packets_sent{node=~"$destination_node", destination_node=~"$destination_node"}[$__range]))
  -
  sum by (destination_node) (rate(kube_node_ping_packets_received{node=~"$destination_node", destination_node=~"$destination_node"}[$__range]))
)
/
  sum by (destination_node) (rate(kube_node_ping_packets_sent{node=~"$destination_node", destination_node=~"$destination_node"}[$__range]))

( 
  sum by (destination_node) (rate(kube_node_ping_packets_sent{node=~"$destination_node", destination_node=~"$destination_node"}[$__interval_rv]))
  -
  sum by (destination_node) (rate(kube_node_ping_packets_received{node=~"$destination_node", destination_node=~"$destination_node"}[$__interval_rv]))
)
/
  sum by (destination_node) (rate(kube_node_ping_packets_sent{node=~"$destination_node", destination_node=~"$destination_node"}[$__interval_rv]))

panels.description: Средние значения измерений, сгруппированные по источникам ping запросов

targets.expr:
(
  sum by (destination_node) (rate(kube_node_ping_packets_sent{node=~"$source_node", destination_node=~"$destination_node"}[$__range]))
  -

)
/

(
  sum by (destination_node) (rate(kube_node_ping_packets_sent{node=~"$source_node", destination_node=~"$destination_node"}[$__interval_rv]))
  -
  sum by (destination_node) (rate(kube_node_ping_packets_received{node=~"$source_node", destination_node=~"$destination_node"}[$__interval_rv]))
)
/
  sum by (destination_node) (rate(kube_node_ping_packets_sent{node=~"$source_node", destination_node=~"$destination_node"}[$__interval_rv]))
